name: hay-picapermalink
title: Pica Permalink
description: A small Javascript bookmarklet to generate a permalink to library catalogues that uses the OCLC PICA software.
keywords: kb, bookmarklet, permalink, libraries, oclc, pica
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-nadownload
title: NA Download
description: A small tool to download all images from a Dutch National Archive inventory.
keywords: na, nationaal archief, download, glam, inventory
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-streetwiki
title: Streetwiki
description: View Wikipedia articles in Google Maps & Street View.
keywords: wikipedia, google maps, maps, visual, reuse, streetview
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-sgdtransform
title: SGD Transform
description: Add a source URL to XML files provided by the Staten Generaal Digitaal API.
keywords: sgd, xml, staten generaal digitaal, kb
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-exturl
title: External URL stats
description: A better External links search. Collates all the links so you can view which Wikipedia pages have the most external links to a pattern.
keywords: url, links, search, external links, stats
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-directory
title: Tools Directory
description: A way to easily discover Wikimedia-related tools.
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-wdview
title: Wikidata View
description: A simple Reasonator-like viewer for Wikidata items using the simplified Wikidata Readyonly API.
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-nasearch
title: NA search
description: A tool to do a mass search in the Dutch National Archive photo collection
keywords: search, nationaal archief, national archive, photos, glam
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-gtaa
title: GTAA Reasonator
description: Reasonator-like tool for viewing items in the GTAA (Gemeenschappelijke Thesaurus Audiovisuele Archieven ).
author: Hay Kranen
